title: A descriptive account of Asam, with a sketch of the local geography and a concise history of the tea-plant of Asam: to which is added a short account of the neighbouring tribes, exhibiting their history, manners, and customs
creator: Robinson, William
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Robinson, William: A descriptive account of Asam, with a sketch of the local geography and a concise history of the tea-plant of Asam: to which is added a short account of the neighbouring tribes, exhibiting their history, manners, and customs  illustrated with four maps, drawn expressly for the work.
